title: Cinematic Sound FX - The Sci-Fi Collection
description: The Sci-Fi Collection contains 1000+ sound effects from every sci-fi sound library that we have released so far. It features ambiences, drones, textures, swooshes / wooshes, impacts, glitches, sequences, and more.
longDescription:
The Sci-Fi Collection contains 1000+ sound effects from every sci-fi sound library that we have released so far. It features ambiences, drones, textures, swooshes / wooshes, impacts, glitches, sequences, and more.


Audio Previews: https://soundcloud.com/gregorquendel/sets/sci-fi-bundle


1028 16bit/44.1kHz WAV files / Meta-tagged (Soundminer)


Designed Sci-Fi - 546 files / 805 MB

Designed Circuits - 271 files / 384 MB

Designed Mecha - 47 files / 52 MB

Designed Atmospheres - 82 files / 1.11 GB

Designed Glitch Scenes - I - 30 files / 175 MB

Designed Statics - 53 files / 253 MB

4.5+ Hours in total
technicalDetails:
Features:

 

Number of Audio Waves: 1028

Number of Audio Cues : 1028

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.100 / 16

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 279

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
